location.reviewPrompt: Write a review about your rock climbing training:

list.li1: We use only high-quality equipment from world-renowned and reliable brands.
list.li2: All equipment is regularly inspected and updated.
list.li3: We fully provide all the necessary gear for a comfortable and safe training session.

details.li3: Harness â€” secured on the body at three points and suitable for people up to 150 kg.

details.li5: Chalk â€” absorbs moisture and improves grip on the rock.
details.li6: Climbing shoes â€” for better traction on the rock.

accessibility.title: POINT 2 (ACCESSIBILITY)
accessibility.description: We conduct a safety briefing before every training session. For beginners, we clearly explain what should not be done. Top-rope belaying is used, and on difficult sections the instructor provides assistance. The Gonioâ€“Kvariati crag features routes of grades 5 and 6 that are suitable for beginners.

experience.title: POINT 3 (EXPERIENCE)
experience.description: Our team (Sasha and Egor) has extensive experience on this terrain and takes care of you throughout the entire training session.
